    • Method Detail

      • onStartCommand

        public int onStartCommand(android.content.Intent intent,
                          int flags,
                          int startId)
        the purpose of overriding the method startcommand(intent, flags, startid) is to return START_STICKY rather than default return value.
        Overrides:
        onStartCommand in class android.app.IntentService
        Parameters:
        intent -
        flags -
        startId -
        Returns:
        START_STICKY: representing that the service object will last after each command has been executed.
